title: Strengthening Hospitality Practice Competencies: Social Sector Competencies in Web 2.0-Based Virtual Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and intermediate expertise in social sector fields
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners will be able to plan and execute social problem-solving projects using virtual collaboration tools (Google Docs, Padlet, etc.).
Learners will engage in academic discussions based on critical thinking with over 80% participation in Web 2.0-based discussion platforms (Discord, Slack, etc.).
Learners will be able to systematically organize learning outcomes in digital portfolios (blogs, Notion, etc.) and write self-assessment reports.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
